name: Angry Storage Manager - Trijam 181
description:
Your angry storage manager has asked you to complete 5 orders as fast as you can!
Whats the least amount of steps you can take to complete these orders?

Click - Select a box
Move - Arrow keys,
R - Reset boxes (also counts as a step)

Game made for Trijam 181, under 3 hours.
Game made my Tõnu
